Blacksmith Wind Rooney
It was quite interesting ...
I worked a long time and I managed to make a totem with the power of dragons.
Depending on the combination, you can attach a variety of effects, but such a device would work only in areas where the force of dragons ...
There are four types of totems. But they can be combined. Currently available are the following varieties:
"Totem Body"
"Totem Spirit"
"Totem of Freedom"
"Totem of Courage"
